metadata.synopsis: One-liner dialog with Baneite Officer 17, available if the player resolves the dead mans switch threat dialog without combat.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AOpen Recon, and turn on Roll Amazingteleport to -269; 6; -149, and a dialog will auto-startChose the deception option in the dialogAfter succeeding, the dialog should soon endwalk up to and click on S_LOW_BaneiteOfficer17_f6614259-eec4-4c38-b87b-cf5c806be6fd

0.speaker: Fist of Bane Bagdog
0.text: You are fortunate to be here, Dread One. The joy of seeing a completed Watcher pacify the masses is unmatched.

1.speaker: Fist of Bane Bagdog
1.text: Keep thine eyes watchful - the Gondians slack in their work at every opportunity.
